name: Dhikr , Pray & salavat counter
description: One of the most original and precious traditions is Pray on the Prophet (peace and blessings of God be upon him). Pray is the best citation for treating diseases, treating diseases, and fixing troubles. Remembering God is one of the most important factors in reaching Gods glory. You must have mentioned that you should mention it, but you did not have the praises or salutations. This digital version is a rosary. A very functional app for viewing and counting pray and your loved ones. The program has a simple and, of course, beautiful interface that allows anyone to use the program. The main features of the program are as follows: * Date of the day as a solar and lunar * View the notes every day on the applications home screen * Audio playback * Possibility to set the target number of the note * Possibility to zero down the counts * Counting by sound enhancement button * Beautiful and modern user interface * Ability to choose the desired theme * Ability to change color palatable numbers * Multilingual support  Some of the notes in the program: Remember the days of the week
